//default_Constructor

public class constructorTest {
	

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//default constructor
		st student1=new st();
		st student2=new st();
		student1.cMethod();
		student2.cMethod();

	}

}
class st{
	int rollNo;
	String StudentName;

	void cMethod() {
		rollNo=4004;
		StudentName="Shikhavat";
		System.out.println(rollNo+" "+StudentName);
		
	}
	
}
//Parametrized constructor
package proj1;

public class constructorTest2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//Parameterized constructor
		st1 student3=new st1(122,"Raj");
		st1 student4=new st1(118,"rose");
		student3.cMethod1();
		student4.cMethod1();
		

	}

}
class st1{
	int rollNo1;
	String StudentName1;
	
	public st1(int r,String sn) {
		rollNo1=r;
		StudentName1=sn;
	}
	void cMethod1() {
		System.out.println(rollNo1+" "+StudentName1);
	}
}
